item.title: IoT Battery Charger for Android
item.description: IoT Battery Charger on Google Play This app intelligently manages your phone’s charging cycle using your existing Google Home compatible smart switch. Simply connect your phone charger to a smart switch, select the switch within the app, and set your desired charging window (e.g., start charging at 20%, stop at 80%). Key Features: Google Home Integration: Seamlessly connects to your Google Home ecosystem to control your smart switches. Customizable Charging Limits: Set specific lower and upper battery percentage thresholds (hysteresis) to start and stop charging.
